Package com.jidesoft.shortcut

The package contains classes for JIDE Shortcut Editor product.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Product  
ShortcutListener A listener interface to receive ShortcutEvent.
ShortcutSchemaListener A listener interface to receive ShortcutSchemaEvent.
 

Class Summary
KeyboardShortcut KeyboardShortcut represents a kind of shortcuts that triggered by keyboard.
MouseShortcut MouseShortcut represents a kind of shortcuts that triggered by mouse.
Shortcut Abstract class for Shortcut.
ShortcutEditor ShortcutEditor is an editor for ShortcutSchemaManager.
ShortcutEvent ShortcutEvent is used to notify interested parties that shortcuts in shortcut editor has changed in the event source.
ShortcutField A LabeledTextField that is used to display Shortcut.
ShortcutPersistenceUtils A helper class that can support persist ShortcutSchema to/from xml file.
ShortcutSchema A data structure for ShortcutSchema.
ShortcutSchemaEvent ShortcutSchemaEvent is used to notify interested parties that schema has changed in the event source.
ShortcutSchemaManager ShortcutSchemaManager is a manager for ShortcutSchema.
 

Package com.jidesoft.shortcut Description

The package contains classes for JIDE Shortcut Editor product.
